title: 70 Undeniably Chic Gifts for Every Woman in Your Life
description: From stylish stocking stuffers to little luxuries, presents for each one on your list right this way.
excerpt: From stylish stocking stuffers to little luxuries, find the perfect gifts for women to unwrap here.
text: Eberjey Sleep Chic 2-Piece Pajama SetThere’s nothing better than a cozy new pair of pajamas for the holidays. Eberjey is a brand beloved by many editors, and the label’s soft red set is at the top of our list.Ugg Disquette AthersonYou can never go wrong with a new pair of Uggs, especially the latest shearling-lined design that comes with a subtle platform heel.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLoewe x Suna Fujita Flamenco Bunnies Small ClutchThe iconic Loewe Flamenco bag just received a chic makeover, thanks to a collaboration with Suna Fujita. The update is sure to go down in fashion history, so if she’s a fashion fanatic, she’ll appreciate the museum-worthy bag.Coach Shearling Earmuffs’Tis the season to stay warm in style. Reach for Sezane’s lifestyle set that comes with a cosmetic pouch, jewelry box, and the prettiest pair of socks.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBottega Veneta Déjà Minuit Eau de ParfumIf she has a sophisticated palate, she’ll appreciate Bottega Veneta’s elegant scent. French Knot River Hand Knit Wool MittenNow’s the perfect time to help her update her winter accessories. These mittens will be a joy to unwrap, thanks to the vibrant embroidered florals.Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
Eberjey Sleep Chic 2-Piece Pajama Set

There’s nothing better than a cozy new pair of pajamas for the holidays. Eberjey is a brand beloved by many editors, and the label’s soft red set is at the top of our list.

Ugg Disquette Atherson

You can never go wrong with a new pair of Uggs, especially the latest shearling-lined design that comes with a subtle platform heel.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Loewe x Suna Fujita Flamenco Bunnies Small Clutch

The iconic Loewe Flamenco bag just received a chic makeover, thanks to a collaboration with Suna Fujita. The update is sure to go down in fashion history, so if she’s a fashion fanatic, she’ll appreciate the museum-worthy bag.

Coach Shearling Earmuffs

’Tis the season to stay warm in style. Coach makes earmuffs look better than ever with a fuzzy creation anchored with a leather band.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chanel Eau Fraïche Gentle Perfumed Soaps

One of the must luxurious things you can give her is something from Chanel. And this lush soap set clocks in at less than $100.

Tory Burch Kira Charm Diamond Quilt Vanity Case

Versatility is the way to go. This Tory Burch case was designed to hold all of her cosmetics, but it’s so chic she can also tote it as a mini handbag.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tom Ford Café Rose Eau de Parfum Set

If you haven’t heard, Tom Ford makes some of the best scents. (Taylor Swift agrees.) This set—which is valued at $210—makes gift-giving easy and wrapping paper unnecessary, thanks to its gorgeous packaging.

COS Pull Fair Isle Sweater

A Fair Isle sweater will add a bit of character to her winter wardrobe. This one earns bonus points for its effortlessly chic oversized fit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chanel Première Gourmette Chain Watch

For a timeless gift that she can cherish for years and years to come, wrap up Chanel’s chainlink watch.

Intelligent Change: The Five Minute Journal

If she’s constantly talking about journaling, this is the gift to give her. With more than 13,000 nearly perfect five-star reviews, it’s sure to help her develop a positive habit that will improve her life.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Puma Speedcat OG Sneakers

One of the most coveted sneakers of the year would certainly make for a perfect gift, especially for those who love comfy kicks.

Schoolhouse Stillwater Floral Stocking

Need to upgrade her stocking? This floral print puts a chabby chic twist on the holiday classic.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mango Fur-Effect Coat

A snuggly coat like the one here will check both boxes of offering function and style.

Maison Francis Kurkdjian Paris Fragrance Miniatures Gift Set

What’s better than one viral fragrance? How about five of them? This is the unbeatable set that’s on every woman’s wish list.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Paravel Weekender Set Plus

Help her manifest more expeditions in 2025 with a new luggage set. The best part: This one can be customized with her initials.

Saint Laurent Cassandre Patent Leather Cardholder

If you haven’t heard yet, burgundy is the color of the season. There’s no better way for her to keep her cards organized than with this luxe holder.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Your Name in a Snowflake Ornament

Zoom in and you’ll see that this unique gift idea will use her name to craft up a pretty snowflake ornament to add to her collection.

Sézane Set Lifestyle

For three gifts in one. Reach for Sezane’s lifestyle set that comes with a cosmetic pouch, jewelry box, and the prettiest pair of socks.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bottega Veneta Déjà Minuit Eau de Parfum

If she has a sophisticated palate, she’ll appreciate Bottega Veneta’s elegant scent. At the heart, it embodies the essence of sweet jasmine and is anchored by the spicy warmth of vanilla bourbon extract.

French Knot River Hand Knit Wool Mitten

Now’s the perfect time to help her update her winter accessories. These mittens will be a joy to unwrap, thanks to the vibrant embroidered florals.

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
